title: Module 1: Introduction to Physical AI
description: Welcome to the first module of our deep dive into Physical AI. This module serves as the cornerstone for the entire textbook, establishing the fundamental concepts and principles that distinguish intelligent systems operating in the physical world from their purely digital counterparts. Here, we will explore the very essence of what makes a robot "intelligent" in a physical context and set the stage for the more advanced topics to come.
